definition: to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident
to walk (side part of split character)
class or grade/generation/plaintiff and defendant (old)/government department (old)
to avoid suffering/to avoid meeting (a fatal accident)/spared

pinyin: wu1 lou4 geng4 zao1 lian2 ye4 yu3

definition: beset by a series of mishaps (idiom)
to meet with disaster/to die tragically
see 屋漏偏逢連夜雨|屋漏偏逢连夜雨[wu1 lou4 pian1 feng2 lian2 ye4 yu3]
pinyin: po4 wu1 you4 zao1 lian2 ye4 yu3

sentences.english: Rain-triggered flood submerges parts of Dazhou.
sentences.chinese: 四川达州遭暴雨袭击，洪水漫城。

sentences.english: Fortunately, Ijurmped back in time to avoid being hit.
sentences.chinese: 很侥幸，我及时往后跳以免费遭撞击。

sentences.english: If the scourge slay suddenly, he will laugh at the trial of the innocent.
sentences.chinese: 若忽然遭杀害之祸，他必戏笑无辜的人遇难。

sentences.english: The disease is not rare in clinic, but it is often misdiagnosed and patients have to be reoperated on.
sentences.chinese: 该病临床并非少见，但既往易被误诊而遭再次手术。

sentences.english: He wanted to avenge the death of his younger brother, who had been killed by Vishnu.
sentences.chinese: 他想为遭毗湿奴杀害的弟弟报仇。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 这只小企鹅是在上个月出生的，刚落地就遭父母虐待。

sentences.english: Not obtrusive, go up pertly courtship, you can refuse for certain.
sentences.chinese: 不要莽撞，冒冒失失上去求爱，你肯定会遭拒绝。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该同心协力以援助遭水灾的灾民。

sentences.english: A unit of the SSA North's First Brigade attacked without provocation.
sentences.chinese: 北掸邦军第一旅的单位遭缅军突然袭击。

sentences.english: Xiu Han Dynasty by Wang Mang to kill this golden rooster lead the way by which name.
sentences.chinese: 因西汉末年刘秀遭王莽追杀到此金鸡引路而名。

sentences.english: None were cancelled or lapsed during the period.
sentences.chinese: 于期内，概无任何购股权遭注销或作废。

sentences.english: Villagers gather outside a house whose walls cracked from an earthquake in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 地震过后，村民们聚在一所遭损伤房屋的窗外。

sentences.english: In nineteen eighty-three, Patricia Neal suffered another personal tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 在一九八三年，帕特里夏尼尔再遭个人的悲剧。

sentences.english: Records of Zheng He's incredible voyages were burned.
sentences.chinese: 郑和令人惊叹的航海纪录也遭焚毁湮灭。
世代交替的甜蜜，是否遭背叛？

sentences.english: A rainforest restoration project in southern China is engulfed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 中国南部的归还热带雨林计划遭火海吞没。

definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
to suffer the painful loss of (a loved one etc)/to miss out on (an opportunity)/to fail to gain (victory etc)
once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to meet with disaster/to die tragically
